metadata.title: CVE-2009-4490 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - negligible
metadata.description: mini_httpd 1.19 writes data to a log file without sanitizing non-printablecharacters, which might allow remote attackers to modify a window's title,or possibly execute arbitrary commands or overwrite files, via an HTTPrequest containing an escape sequence for a terminal emulator.

criterions.comment: mini-httpd package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
